resources.string: Constantinople is the largest city in Turkey.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
They have the British accents in the UK.
Hiroshima and Nagasaki were the two places that were bombed in WW2.
The main dish to eat in Korea is the Ramen
One of Hawaii\'s major gods is Pele, the goddess of volcanoes.
